top_comment.text: This was my favorite episode of the shoot working on Season 4, and now I find out Casey worked on it too! Happy family of friends making cool stuff for the internets!
top_comment.author: Juan Carlos Bagnell

comments.text: I hope you get to be in more episodes.

comments.text: Your part was great too!

comments.text:

comments.text:
Wow... Hero Lass is scary!!!! :)

That episode was pure awesome.

in this week's episode of Shelf Life. Check it out!﻿

comments.text:

The "She's Young!!!" comment was a line from the song she wrote for the 
commercial. I found that line to be humorous.

captions.text:
RAGGEDY ANN
Andy? Fuck Andy.

I know...  I know he's my brother and all,
but fuck that guy. Fuck him!
So what's your family all about?

RAGGEDY ANN
And y'know what? I did try to
fuck that guy, I did

but he was so not into that
because he's - you know what I mean?

RAGGEDY ANN
Why don't you pop this on...
{MUSIC - THEME SONG}
Shelf Life!
Shelf Life!

The world needs a team of
braver smarter faster heroes

SAMURAI SNAKE
You look excited.

HERO LASS
I am excited. There hasn't been a
new Hero Lass commercial in years!

HERO MAN
Yeah. Not since that recall in 2002.

HERO LASS
We don't talk about the recall!

We had no control over the fact lead
paint is delicious!

BUG BOY
Did I miss it?

BUG BOY
Sorry; I would've gotten here sooner, but -

I just realized that
the radiator is covered in candy!

ANNOUNCER
And now! A word from our sponsor!

HERO LASS
Shh! It's starting!

ANNOUNCER
KIDS! Remember how much you LOVED
Hero Lass?

ANNOUNCER
Well -  GET READY TO TOTALLY FREAK OUT
FOR YOUNG HERO LASS!

HERO LASS
What the fuck?

SINGER
YOUNG HERO LASS...

HERO MAN
Wow. She is HOT.

SINGER
SHE'S LIKE HERO LASS BUT SHE IS YOUNG

SINGER
SHE CAN SEE THROUGH WALLS!/ AND SHE'S SO
THIN!/THAT SHE'S INVISIBLE
SHE CAN EAT WHATEVER AND NEVER GETS FAT!
YOUNG HERO LASS/YOUNG HERO LASS

SHE'S WAY, WAY BETTER THAN OLD
HERO LASS
SHE"S OLD!

HERO LASS
Turn it off. TURN IT OFF!

BUG BOY
She obviously doesn't have
your...Years of accumulated wisdom.

HERO MAN
Yeah! And really, you're not that old.
I mean, you could be a LOT older.

SAMURAI SNAKE
You're a collector's item.

BUG BOY
Exactly. You're vintage.

HERO MAN
Mm - An antique!

HERO MAN
Psst!

HERO MAN
Can I try a bite of that?

HERO LASS
Stupid invisibility and x-ray vision!
"Young Hero Lass" my old Hero ASS!

SAMURAI SNAKE
That commercial really got to her.

BUG BOY
Yeah, she's been like this for a
week. We gotta do something.

HERO LASS
N-eeaargh!

SAMURAI SNAKE
It's too bad she doesn't actually
have those powers.

BUG BOY
Snake, my friend, you've just given
me a powerful idea...

SINGER
YOUNG HERO LASS/YOUNG HERO LASS...

HERO MAN
You know who's great? Hero Lass.
I don't say that out loud enough.

SAMURAI SNAKE
And her hair...

HERO MAN
Yes! Her hair is great. I wish she was
here so I could tell her that.

HERO LASS
Guys, I'm right here.

SAMURAI SNAKE
Did you hear that?

HERO MAN
You're right! I hear her, too!

HERO MAN
Hero Lass? Are you there?

HERO LASS
I said I'm --

HERO MAN
INVISIBLE! That must be it, Hero Lass!

You must have the power of
invisibility!

BUG BOY
Boy, I sure am not naked today.

HERO LASS
JESUS TAPDANCING CHRIST! PUT ON
SOME GODDAMNED CLOTHES!

HERO MAN
Whatever are you talking about,
Hero Lass?

He's as clothed as you
are invisible!

SAMURAI SNAKE
It's her x-Ray vision!

BUG BOY
Yes! It must be X-Ray
vision, just like Young Hero Lass!

BUG BOY
Invisibility, X-Ray vision and
the power of flight!

Even better
than Young Hero Lass!

HERO MAN
So how's about a smile?
Or is it your time of the month again?

HERO MAN
OW! My invisibly punched balls!

BUG BOY
Sorry, Lass. It's just that I really wanted to...
we wanted to cheer you up.
Cause I...we... really care about you.

HERO LASS
Thanks guys. But I just have to accept it.

I'm not the big deal I used to be.
Maybe I am ol--

ANNOUNCER
We interrupt our programming with
this important news bulletin.

Young Hero Lass has been recalled,
due to highly toxic leaky silicone.

If your child has been exposed
to this toy, seek immediate -

HERO LASS
Maybe that young bitch fucked
with the wrong antique - BOO-YA!

SAMUTAI SNAKE
Yeah! Oh, yeah!

HERO MAN
SHE MIGHT BE OLD

BUG BOY
BUT SHE DOESN'T KILL KIDS!

SAMURAI SNAKE
BUT MAKE NO MISTAKE

HERO MAN
SHE'S STILL PRETTY... OLD!

HERO MAN
Ow! My God!
Shelf Life!
Shelf Life!
Shelf Life!
Shelf!

The world needs a team
of braver smarter faster heroes

RAGGEDY ANN
You look so, oh! So good in that hat.
Oh God, I love Andy. I love Andy so much.
Oh, yeah, yeah, yeah!
Up in there, up in there... yeah!
